name: The Experimental Intelligence
description:
In The Experimental Intelligence you are a little jelly with the ability to become solid and gaseous touching something cold or hot.

The puzzles designed by your creator, the eclectic scientist Doctor Lang, will test your ability in funny and surprising ways, permitting you to experiment many interactions in an increasing challenge.

Flying? Sinking? Stunning robots? Changing shape? You’ll be surprised of what a little jelly is capable of!

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
